plain: Based on the user's favorite books, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is coming-of-age, their favorite plot is character-driven, their favorite setting is a fictionalized version of their real life, their favorite writing style is stream-of-consciousness, their favorite length is novel, their favorite topic is the human condition, their favorite pacing is a mix of slow and fast-paced sections, their favorite narrative structure is first-person, and their favorite themes are mental health and the impact of trauma.
